Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Puszta-Wehmut, S. 246

1871 · LW A255 · R. 113

This is an arragement of a song by Ludmilla Gizycka-Zamoyska. Liszt also made an arrangement for violin and piano (S. 379b; LW D17).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · II/13 · Z. A/B 12402 · Free Arrangements XIII · ed. Péter Bozó / Adrienne Kaczmarczyk

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
